data.title: The One Number That Shows Why Climate Change Is Making Hurricane Season Worse: '...the air can hold 7% more water with every degree Celsius that the temperature rises.'

A teenage boy was "moments away" from carrying out a high school massacre after going to class with a shotgun, knife, balaclava and 200 rounds of ammunition, a UK court has heard.
YouTube has shut down two North Korean propaganda channels that academics use to monitor and assess the regime’s missile programs.

Germany's 'deadliest company' pledges to stop selling guns to crisis regions. The move makes Heckler & Koch the first arms company to have a more ethical export control policy than its own government.
